participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, Ethan enjoys challenges and outdoor activities. He is analytical and loves problem-solving.
participant_1.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i'm a mechanical engineer. i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Samantha is passionate about education and enjoys engaging with children. She has a playful side and loves games.
participant_2.background: i am an elementary school teacher. i love to play board games. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. my parents were also teachers. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.
